func.title: GetPortrait

param.name: get_id
param.desc: If true, the function returns the id of the definition from which the portrait was taken. Otherwise, the name of the portrait.

param.name: get_permanent
param.desc: If true, the function returns the values of the object's permanent portrait. Otherwise, the values of the currently used portrait which might be temporary.

func.desc: Retrieves name or id of the portrait of a crew member.
func.remark: If the crew member has an individually stored portrait, the function returns "custom" and the id NONE. Also see the table and description of the fCopyGfx parameter in SetPortrait

example.text: Assigns a random portrait to this clonk if the name of the current portrait is not just an index (i.e. "1", "2", "3") but a full portrait name (i.e. "Armored1", "Armored2").
Restores the default portrait of a clonk in case it was changed by a SetPortrait call.
